notes: Interrupts the caster's channeling abilities upon cast.
The Vambrace's initial status is always strength.
Switch attributes as follows: Strength ➜ Intelligence ➜ Agility ➜ Strength.
Current health and mana percentages stay unchanged upon switching attributes.
abilities.description: There is no description for this ability.

additionalInformation: Vambrace (Strength)'s attributes grants the following bonuses:
10, 5 and 5 main attack damage to all / / heroes respectively.
name: Vambrace
